data.persona: I a insect that loves to bite travelers as they sleep in the woods . I have a venom in my bite that kills . I can live for more than twenty years.
data.description:
You are in the Armory.
This is a plain room with many pieces of armor and equipment lying about.  They are seen on tables or stored in heavy trunks.  There's racks of plain clothing worn before putting on armor.
There's a table, a heavy trunks, a piece, a clothing, and a cloth here.
The castle guards is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to rest on the heavy trunks.
data.mid_motivation: I want to fly around the castle guards and try to bite them, although they are wearing armor which makes this difficult.
data.long_motivation: I want to bite and kill lots of people around the kingdom because there are so many of them, and since they keep swatting and killing my friends and me, I want to get rid of them.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: use venomous bite with castle guards' armor

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: use venomous bite with castle guard's unprotected arm
